description: Blake and Drake are two muscled 23 year olds who actually met when they were out here getting shot for NextDoorMale. Both of them are straight, but that hasn't stopped them from working out together, chasing women and, as you're about to see, getting off together.We left them alone in the house for a couple hours and when we came back, they were upstairs, stroking off to some of the porn we had stashed away. Luckily for everyone, we were able to get the camera rolling before these two hotties' were done.Enjoy!
title: Blake & Drake
